name: The test of beauty | 小姐姐的考验
name_original: The test of beauty | 小姐姐的考验
description:
This is just a 3D Spot the Difference game! There is nothing special in this game, except pretty girls, accurate models, high-definition screen and sometimes less dress up etc...

Game content

  • 1. High-precision figures of beautiful girls.
  • 2. Two hairstyles.
  • 3. 6 sets of clothes.
  • 4. Ten Play levels.
  • 4. Ten scenes for screenshots.
  • 4. At least ten beautiful BG musics.

Attention

Due to the Unity High Definition Render Pipeline, a setting to limit the frame rate has been added. The actual utilization rate of the 1050 Ti graphics card is about 45%, and there is no pressure at all.
